attributes.action: Review the National Curriculum to reduce crime and discrimination
attributes.additional_details: Am happy to do some more research / digging, done a few online courses that suggest education is the key to stopping certain issues; e.g. homelessness, crime, discrimination. I also have access to a database through my university to research articles (peer-reviewed) and am happy to dig up some more information.
attributes.background: I've personally been studying a Psychology Degree for the last three years now and I have personally learnt a lot about why we as humans do the things we do. I have seen a general theme underlying issues we face in society, such as hate, crime, prejudice, etc. And that is the lack of education!

rejection.details: It's not clear what changes you would like the Government to make to the National Curriculum. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
